steps.description: mixing of the cationic dye with cyanostar

synthesis.notes: R3B SMILES is a mix of the cationic dye R3B-ClO4 with 2 equivalents of cyanostar. The counter anions of the dye form complexes with cyanostar, which helps to structure crystallisation and preserve the fluorescence of the dye in solution. SMILES materials have superior fluorescence properties to the solids of the dye alone.

evaluation.reasoning: The extraction correctly identified the synthesised material, its type and the synthesis method. The quantities of cyanostar are correctly noted.
